entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who has 10 Galleons and wants to get an owl. She is also being teased by Harry and Ron about eating or sleeping.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as having Hedwig, an owl, and teasing Hermione about eating or sleeping.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as having Scabbers, a pet rat, and teasing Hermione about eating or sleeping. He also wants to get his pet checked over.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is mentioned as Harry's owl.

entities.name: errol
entities.description: Errol is mentioned as a family owl and Ron says he hasn't got him.

entities.name: scabbers
entities.description: Scabbers is mentioned as Ron's pet rat. He looks thinner than usual and has a droop to his whiskers.

entities.name: galleons
entities.description: Galleons are mentioned as the currency Hermione has.

relationships.description: Hermione wants to get an owl like Harry's Hedwig.
Ron mentions that Errol is a family owl.
Ron has Scabbers, the pet rat.
